threat_model.threat: Spoofing: Malicious repo URL in manifest
threat_model.mitigation: Validate URL matches known source before fetching

threat_model.threat: Tampering: Corrupted update introduces malicious code
threat_model.mitigation: Checksum validation of all files before applying update
Use HTTPS, rely on git's built-in integrity checks

threat_model.threat: Repudiation: No audit trail of updates
threat_model.mitigation: Manifest tracks version history with timestamps

threat_model.threat: DoS: Script hangs on network issues
Elevation of Privilege: Script runs with elevated permissions
threat_model.mitigation: No sudo required, respects user file permissions
